entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:39 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 12:39 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
